summary: Tragi-comic, romantic whodunnit set in a run down hotel which plays host to mentally ill people too poor to afford medical insurance.
cast: Jeremy Davies|Milla Jovovich|Mel Gibson|Jimmy Smits|Peter Stormare|Amanda Plummer|Gloria Stuart|Tom Bower|Donal Logue|Bud Cort|Julian Sands|Conrad Roberts|Harris Yulin|Charlayne Woodard|Ellen Cleghorne|Richard Edson|Tito Larriva|Jon Hassell|Justin Lafoe|Ezra Buzzington|David Stifel|Winston J. Rocha|Frederique Van Der Wal|Roger Stoneburner|Erik Rondell|Michael Arturo|Monty Bane|Bono|Jeff Buckner|Clay Caan|Christa Engelskirch|Kirk R. Gardner|Phil Hawn|Susan Jordan|Tiger Mendez|Tim Roth|Alex Sol|Wim Wenders
title: The Million Dollar Hotel
